data.title: Gauri Pradhan Tejwani Height, Weight, Age, Husband, Biography & More
data.text:

Sister- None ReligionHinduism HobbiesTravelling, Shopping Favourite Things Favourite ActorLeonardo DiCapario Favourite FilmHollywood- Titanic Favourite SingerSonu Nigam Favourite ColoursYellow, Black Boys, Affairs and More Marital StatusMarried Affairs/BoyfriendsHiten Tejwani (Actor) Husband/SpouseHiten Tejwani (Actor) Marriage Date29 April 2004 ChildrenSon- Neevan Tejwani

Some Lesser Know Facts About Gauri Pradhan Tejwani

Does Gauri Pradhan smoke?: Not Known

Does Gauri Pradhan drink alcohol?: Not Known

She started modeling at the age of 18.

In 1998, while she was pursuing her second year in college, she went to Mumbai to take part in Femina Miss India and was among the ten finalists along with Smriti Irani.

She has done many TV commercials for big brands like- Sprite, Bru, Santoor, Dabur, Colgate, Phillips, etc.

In 1999, she debuted her acting career with the historical TV series- ‘Noorjahan’, which was telecasted on Doordarshan.

She also appeared in some music videos like Talat Aziz’s- Khubsoorat, Hans Raj Hans’s- Jhanjar and Sonu Nigam’s- Yaad.

She rose to fame with the TV series ‘Kutumb’ (2001) that was aired on Sony TV.

In 2002, she participated in one of the episodes of the singing reality show ‘Kisme Kitna Hai Dum’.

In 2006, she participated in a celebrity couple dance reality show – ‘Nach Baliye season-2’ and in a couple game show- ‘Jodi Kamaal Ki’.

In 2010, she along with her husband opened a retro-bar named Barcode 053 at Andheri in Mumbai.

She appeared in the female celebrity game show ‘Meethi Choori No. 1’, which aired on NDTV Imagine.

She is the mother of twins, a son and a daughter.
